thread.section_title: TerraTrike Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TerraTrike | www.terratrike.com
thread.title: James Christopherson :

author: James Christopherson :
title: James Christopherson :
text: I did research for six months before I settled with Terra Trike Rover. They have the most inexpensive trike that I could find that had a quality name to it. In the end I had called customer support twice with questions before I purchased the Rover and both time the person on the other end was wonderful. I made my purchase and got my trike even quicker that they stated----like 4 days and it was here. The trike is awesome but I did find out something future buyers should know. The aftermarket parts you can get a lot cheaper than from Terra Trike itself, so if you need flags or mirrors or bells check your local store first. I Love my rover!!!
